properties.Observatio: The spring is located on private land. The owner of the land has built a tank to collect water. This water project is being implemented using the water flowing from that tank. About forty families consume water from this water project.

properties.Name_of_Sp: Samanala Kanda Kadura (Water sources in  Creig Watta, Lower Division )
properties.Observatio: About forty years ago, a water project was prepared to provide water to 75 families, and a water tank was built for that purpose. But since about 300 families currently getting water, that water tank is not enough.
properties.Descriptio:
Construction of a new 60,000 litter water storage tank

Demolish the existing water tank
